title: Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Course for Elementary AI Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education knowledge and experience using educational technology tools
context.additional_context: Emphasis on designing elementary AI education based on mathematics, utilizing VR simulations in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners will apply at least three competency elements based on the TPACK framework when designing AI education.
Learners will design personalized AI education scenarios by analyzing survey and interview data.
Learners will develop at least two types of AI education modules linked to elementary mathematics in a VR simulation environment.
Learners will identify potential ethical issues in AI education and incorporate them into teaching and learning processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
